scripts.minify: css-minify -d assets/css/ && cp -r css-dist/*.min.css assets/css/ && rimraf assets/css/style.css && rimraf css-dist
scripts.prebuild: cp ./node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js assets/js/ && cp ./node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js assets/js/ && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js assets/js/ && cp ./node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/js/all.min.js assets/js/
scripts.postbuild: mkdirp dist/ && cp -r assets index.html dist/
scripts.prestart: rimraf assets/css/ && node-sass scss/ -o assets/css/ && npm run minify && npm run prebuild
